family.description: Raised Kai. Parents worked hard but made time. Younger sister. Father taught discipline without kindness is control. Mother taught feeling deeply is strength. In touch, video calls every few weeks.

partner.name: Mira
partner.dynamic: Calm where Kai is restless. Honesty over comfort. Kai is loyal to her.

friends.name: Ravi
friends.dynamic: Closest friend. Pushes Kai to take breaks. Brotherly.
